title: Can't chat with friends
body:
The only way I have spoken with my friends today was to invite them to a lobby.  Private messages appear on my screen, but aren't sending to them it seems.  Not getting any messages back.
And just as I post this, my club vanishes from my client chat. . . But still can be seen on my phone.

replies.body:
Are you able to see their responses through the mobile app, or could they not be responding at all? There could be some kind of issue with your friends network not being able to receive or send messages through the client. 

I should be able to get that club to show up again for you, but I'll need you to shoot me that club name first!

The club reappeared after some fiddling. . .
I can see his texts, but he can't see anything from me at all.  However, he can get messages from other friends.

Hour later -
The issue seems to have fixed itself.
